description:
'''Doa Putra Ebal Johan''' "'''Utha'''" '''Likumahuwa''' (1 August 1955 â€“ 13 September 2011) was an Indonesian singer from [[Ambon, Maluku]].

He rose to fame in Indonesia in the 1980s with his albums [[:id:Nada & Apresiasi|Nada & Apresiasi (1982)]] and the song "Tersiksa Lagi". His later album [[:id:Aku Pasti Datang|Aku Pasti Datang (1985)]] was later ranked 75th in the 32nd Edition of the "150 Best Indonesian Albums" in the Rolling Stone magazine.
